nodes.text: Beth Petters was a pilot for the Galactic Republic during The High Republic era. Petters died while on board a Longbeam alongside Jedi Knight Te'Ami in 232 BBY while retrieving the Legacy Run's flight recorder during the fortieth Emergence. While stopping a missile shot from the Lourna Dee from destroying the wreckage, they were shot by another missile. The missile killed Te'Ami, Petters, and fellow pilot Marcus Augur.
